install.name: jNews Forward to Friend
install.author: Joobi Limited
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Joobi Limited All rights reserved
install.description: This plugin enables your subscriber to forward the mail to his/her friends.

param.name: viewtemplate
param.label: Display the forward to friend
param.description: Select if you want to display the forward to a friend (when the user clicks on the forward to friend link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: numaddfriendfld
param.label: Number of forward to friends fields
param.description: Select as to how many forward to fields will show.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Introduction text
param.description: The text that appears in the introduction. LEAVE BLANK TO NOT SHOW NOTHING.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post text
param.description: The text that appears in the end. LEAVE BLANK TO NOT SHOW NOTHING.

param.name: defaultmessage
param.label: Default Message
param.default: Hey, I found some interesting mailings here you might like to read for yourself.
param.description: The default message the will be loaded in the forward to a friend form.

param.name: fwdmessage
param.label: Forward Message
param.default: This email was forwarded to you by [FWDEMAIL].
param.description: The forward message that will be included in you forwarded newsletter. [FWDEMAIL] and [FWDNAME] will be replace by the email and name of the forwarder respectively.
